website_summaries.verdict: The type of tire shine spray to choose when you want to add a bright finish to your car's wheels.
pros: The water-resistant formula helps to repeal rain and snow from the wheels during light weather conditions
Helps to keep the rubber intact longer
cons: The longevity of the tire shine decreases in warmer months, in the spring and summer

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's G13815 Hot Shine High Gloss Tire...
customer_reviews.text: To me, I get a higher and longer lasting shine on my tires then doing side-by-side comparison with Amour All tire cleaner and shine. I used Meguiars on the front tire on Driver Side and rear tire on the Passenger side and then used Amour All on the other two tires so I had a good comparison of both the front and back tires for both products. The Meguiar's shine lasted about 8 - 9 days longer. So the old saying, you get what you pay for. Both are good products for the price you pay but to me per ounce, I get more bang for the buck from the Meguiar's.
customer_reviews.author: MGS

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but don't spray it on
customer_reviews.text: This is great for shine but if u don't want to end up with it all over the rest of your car I recommend getting some buff pads there cheap and spray it on the buff pad and then wipe it on your tires it comes out looking great and u don't end up with over spray all over your newly washed car
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Makes tires and black plastic like new.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was recommended to me by a friend in a Jeep group I am in. The black plastic pieces on my 2006 Jeep Grand Cherokee we're starting to loose their shiny new look when I was told about this. I had tried everything from olive oil to Armor All and this stuff works amazing. After I have washes my Jeep, I spray this evenly all over my tires and plastic pieces, let it sit, and the wipe off/rub in with a rag. It will stay shiny for a couple weeks after that if not linger depending on weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity.

customer_reviews.title: Blacked out tires!
customer_reviews.text: This product really adds that final detail in your car wash and wax! It is pricey and you only get to use it about 6 to 8 times, but man it finishes off the car wash so nicely! It makes your tires look brand new and gives it the high level of detail. The stuff does smell when you spray it so make sure you spray it outside :) I will be buying more once spring comes around!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a vehicle staple
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd can since I discovered this stuff. After I wash Jeep, I just spray on tires and it looks like they've been detailed, and the smell is wonderful, it's a happy perk. I'm a girl and I hate cleaning a vehicle; anything I can find that gives great results for little effort--sold. Lazy girl staple.
customer_reviews.author: Cris in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply, but if there is the slightest amount of wind it's going to get all over your rims. It leaves a weird oily residue on your rims so it's best if you somehow block it from hitting your rims unless you want to wash them after applying. I have chrome rims so any dirtiness is easily noticeable. I only do 1 coating and the shine lasts about a week or two depending on weather. It also smells sweet and fruity, which is a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Easy application, long lasting shine.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, easy to spray on, wipe off and shine lasts over 2 weeks, almost 3. Even with rain during 11 days during that time.
customer_reviews.author: rich n seffner

customer_reviews.title: Usually a store purchase
customer_reviews.text: Since March, most purchases online now, and can say product arrived on time and Not damaged. McGuires makes great products
customer_reviews.author: Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting shine
customer_reviews.text: Love Meguires products. Especially their tire shines.. been using for years with only long lasting positive results. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marty G

customer_reviews.title: Good shine but requires care when applying
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job of keeping your tires clean and shiny, but it comes from the can in a very tight spray line. Requires some care to circle around the tires without getting it all over the rims and paint. I like it, but I won't purchase it again. Looking for another wider spray alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. Slings off on paint after 8 Hr of dry time
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a tire shine that don't sling off the tire . this is not the one for me. It shines well and looks good , but a small amount did come off on my car. So I'm on to the next one ( Brand )
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wayne from Fort Gibson, OK

customer_reviews.title: The very best!
customer_reviews.text: Best tire shine I have ever used, goes on clear and evenly. I normally wash my car and use tire shine once a week, don’t have any problems with fading or coming off on car while driving. I spray 2 rounds on and let sit for 30 min to an hour and use cloth to wipe off any access product where tire meets rim.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Better than Foaming Sprays
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This works much better than the "foaming" kinds that you find. This lasts a good while and seems to withstand a couple of rain storms before the tires start to show that brown and untreated look. I also find that this product doesn't run onto my rims as much as the foaming kind and the "sling" effect is greatly reduced with this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Quality shine
customer_reviews.text: Works great and shines stayed on for at least 2 weeks depending on how often I drive the car.
customer_reviews.author: Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Save ur money
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. Doesn't give me the shine I wanted and it comes out like a liquid, I think foam wrks much better and easier to apply. Not happy at all and I bought 2 cans I'm stuck w them now. Disappointing for a regulars product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew&Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply compared to using an old fashioned applicator, however it doesn’t last as long as gel or thick liquid form products. In my opinion this is a perfect product to accompany a quick wash as opposed to a detailed wash.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire shine works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This tire shine worked great I'm not sure how long it lasts as I haven't really checked but I believe I've had it on for maybe a week already and it's rained and it's still on the tire not as shiny but still looks better than normal. I usually use black magic tire shine but this one is much easier to just spray on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Best shine
customer_reviews.text: For best results. Apply shine and then rub into tire with foam pad. Let it sit for about an hour to soak in and the shine does not sling off
customer_reviews.author: Larry Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Deep black shine!
customer_reviews.text: I did a comparison on each side of my wife's Grand Cherokee. I compared the Meguiar's with Armor All and the Mequiar's gives a much better look, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: oibv305

customer_reviews.title: Love the result, just wished it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.text: The tire coating goes on really easily, and definitely gives your tires an amazing shine. I know some other people have mentioned not getting a lot of uses out of the product, but I own an larger SUV with bigger tires and I didn't really need to use a ton to achieve the desired effect. The only thing preventing me from giving it 5 stars is the fact the shine faded pretty quickly after it rained, even though I wasn't actually driving it at the time. I still recommend it, however.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Give you that wet shine look
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for years never disappoint. Love that wet shine look.
customer_reviews.author: R3L

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine
customer_reviews.text: If you like your tires to shine this is a good product, last a little longer than others.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Looks extremley fake for a day or two, but then looks good for about a month.
customer_reviews.text: If you can get over it looking extremely fake for a day or two, it effectively lasts the longest of all products I have tried in this price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: McGuire products are five star
customer_reviews.text: Maguires products are always top notch it always comes down to just the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for easy application
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is ok. The easier the application, the shorter the shine.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use spray on.
customer_reviews.text: This is all I use on my tires. Doesn’t last a whole long time but I just spray on a little more. Very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Does an Ok job
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't give the shine that their foaming tire product does, I wouldn't buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: mward100

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT BUT THE BOX WAS COMPLETELY OPENED BY DELIVERY SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: WHAT'S UP

customer_reviews.title: Another meguiars quality product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and its always been my go to tire gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Donald

customer_reviews.title: It works very good
customer_reviews.text: Good product , easy application and effective results. Worked for me on bumpers and black mirrors but not sure yet about longevity but it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shine is fairly impressive but not the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake, this doesn't really clean a tire, just provide the appearance that the tire is clean until you use the product again (or actually get the car cleaned). Shine is fairly impressive but not the best on the market. Still, worth the price paid. Detailer-level silicone products have the best overall shine that lasts the longest.
customer_reviews.author: Zorak

customer_reviews.title: Great shine
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly one of the best tire shine spray I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: NachoLibre

customer_reviews.title: Shine with substance, Very Kool!
customer_reviews.text: Does really well even after a few snow storm situations!
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive tire shine
customer_reviews.text: Very shiney product just clean your tires with apc and brush before applying. Should last about a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and stays on the tires
customer_reviews.text: This works well because it clings to the tire better than the liquid spray. For nice looking tires and spray that doesn't sling off onto the car's body, this is spray I use. Gives the tire what I would describe as more of a satin gloss vs a high gloss.
customer_reviews.author: DRA

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the money! Less expensive than buying it in an automotive store.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on very long
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on very long. Your just spraying your money away.
customer_reviews.author: PPRICE

customer_reviews.title: Great tire shine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I've used it for years. From my cars, trucks, and even my ATVs... It always leaves people asking what product I use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Gives a great result
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is easy to use. Follow the directions and you will feel like a pro
customer_reviews.author: jake abrahamsen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is fantastic. Not only does it coat tires and keep ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. Not only does it coat tires and keep them looking good for weeks, you use it to spruce up your black molding, running boards, etc.. And if your wheels are old and discolored, it will make them look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: I've had better
customer_reviews.text: Not bad not great. Through my work, I used to get a different brand tire shine. That stuff would last for weeks on my car. When we ran out of that product at work, I decided to try this brand. It goes on easily, looks great, but does not last more than a few days. Amazon does not offer the brand I'm used to, so I will just have to call the company directly.
customer_reviews.author: adubz44

customer_reviews.title: Very good tire shine
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...it’s everything I want a tire shine yo be
customer_reviews.author: Soysit

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but fairly long lasting
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but easy to put on (let dry before driving) and last fairly long.
customer_reviews.author: badeolakona

customer_reviews.title: Never would have thought this would be good to continue to use
customer_reviews.text: Never would have thought this would be good to continue to use. Read some reviews and many people said its good and at the right price is a no brainer. This product is the best that I have used. Period! No sling, keeps the shine, and EASY to apply. By many when on sale and keep in the closet. I have to admit, Meguires products have been outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: LordByron

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up in wet conditions
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I am usually a fan of Meguiar's products. I applied the product, let it sit for a day, the drove to work in the rain. My commute is about 17 miles. I noticed the next day that it had almost completely washed off. I'm pretty disappointed. It does look great though as long as it's not raining.
customer_reviews.author: T.H.

customer_reviews.title: don’t think twice, just get it dude don’t be a cheapskate and look for something cheap(er)
customer_reviews.text: Bad ass great for the price , you can buy any other Tire shine but this one , this one right here leaves it looking wet like out the shower wet, really changes the look of your wheels/ tires and car/truck I really recommend this to those who love there truck or cars clean and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm crazy about shiny tires and I've tried numerous products over the years. This one is my favorite and Amazon has it at a much lower price. It doesn't take much to put on a nice shine. Tires should be dry before using. I hate waiting for my tires to dry after I wash the car....ugghhh.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K. Montrose

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Woks fine. The big pro is that it goes on evenly being that it's aerosol and not pump. The con is that you go through it faster. It's worth the $3.97 I paid as a "add on" item.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite tire dressing
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tire dressing. Adds a nice shine that lasts a while and doesn't feel greasy. But the most important part is that you get no tire sling (this is when the tire dressing flies off the tire and onto your pain when you drive at high-speed's).
customer_reviews.author: Danny C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, leaves a very nice look shiney but not over the top.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, leaves a very nice look shiney but not over the top. Minimal sling off the tires. Does not last in rain, chances are you will have to was the vehicle anyway after a rain.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but doesn't last very long. Shine is nice...not overly glossy.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well, but doesn't last. I'd say you'll need to re-apply every 2 weeks or so. The stuff stinks. Make sure you use it in a well ventilated area and wash it off your rim after applying. The shine is nice, not overly "wet" looking, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: it's the best.
customer_reviews.text: No shine on tires after applying. Extremely diappointed. Wish I could find 'NO TOUCH - Seriously WET' at a decent price, it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: NetGod

customer_reviews.title: A tip to apply is to use a garbage pail lid the same size as your rim
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the foam, but it is just the shine you put on after cleaning. I thought the Foam clean/shine left the tire much more vibrant. Won't buy again, but will get the foam instead. A tip to apply is to use a garbage pail lid the same size as your rim. This eliminates any cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: Vehicle owners must have
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned about this product price was superb and the quality is flawless using this item not only save you money it gives your vehicle tires a showroom polish. No grease residue just a refined look that comes from professional detail places. I'm very pleased I thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamerchant

customer_reviews.title: I only use this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: The best ever and my tires are SO shiny. Been getting this for years!
customer_reviews.author: Steph L. HudsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Runs out too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well but it runs out quickly. I get about 5-6 total uses (all 4 tires per use) whereas the older foam tire shine would provide about double that.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great tire shine
customer_reviews.text: Works great. PROs 1) Shines tires great 2) Lasts long 3) Doesn't seem to "throw" onto paint like some other products I've used. CONs: 1) Can stain driveways if you overspray onto it by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Allison & Bill Dunn

customer_reviews.title: If used as directed, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Basically, if you wash your car/wheels and tires and apply this product your tires are gonna look great. Once mistake I did (only ONCE) was to not let the tires dry completely - the driving left streaks that looked okay but not as impressive as it does when you FOLLOW directions. I recommend this tire coat!
customer_reviews.author: GuapoDad

customer_reviews.title: Tire(d) of crappy tire cleaners? Try this
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I wish the shine would hold a bit longer, but it does make the rubber look wet and new. But don't expect those results to last longer than a few days - it just won't happen. Otherwise, it's easy to use and remove - Meguiar makes good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny West

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this a little better than armor all. It applies evenly and dries pretty quick. Seems to protect your tires better between washes. It is not as shiny as armor all, but it is the perfect blend between too shiny and dull. A can can probably do 4 times about 5-7 times.
customer_reviews.author: Big Perm

customer_reviews.title: Loved this tire shine. Deep black long lasting shine
customer_reviews.text: Wish this product was still available for purchase without being an add on item. This was my favorite tire shine for a long time. Excellent deep shine that lasted over a week and was available at a fraction of the cost compared to its competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, great tire shine with ease of spray application ..!!! Good Job Sparkle Auto Distributor, order received well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: DS416

customer_reviews.title: Works great to shine tires
customer_reviews.text: Great easy product. Goes on easy. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: JeffM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but doesn't last too long and stains your driveway.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these tire shines, but the look definitely doesn't last long. Maybe a week tops it looks good. Also it stains your driveway.
customer_reviews.author: jsgphd

customer_reviews.title: Timely shipment
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine. Have not had a lot of experience with product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Best tire product I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have several show cars and tire dressings have always been an issue. Whether it would wear off or splash on the side of my car while in motion. This product does not do that and it lasts through washes too. I love this stuff. A little pricey but I will pay extra for the results I get from Meguires Hot Shine Gloss!
customer_reviews.author: MARTHA DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: I like the spray bottle more.
customer_reviews.text: Will do the job but hate having to hold my breath to prevent inhaling this stuff. I bought it based on other positive reviews but I'm one that definitely likes the spray bottle more. The shine itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kwit

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I have used many products to dress ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have used many products to dress my tires over the years but spraying gives the best result. I have used many sprays but this is the best one I have ever used. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Can seemed like it was less than half full.. the spray tip was crappy, it didnt spray anything close to even.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it work well finally this stuff has a proper applicator that covers the whole wheel when you spray it on
customer_reviews.author: eloomis

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several cans of this product over the last few years. Provides an easy to apply shine to tires without being greasy. Nozzle is easy to control, minimizing overspray. Keeps hands clean, leaves tires deep black, not greasy. Can do a number of SUV tires with a can.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite wheel shine! Easy to use with little mess on rims
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the high shine on my tires
customer_reviews.text: After reading a review in Popular Mechanics I gave it a try. Very satisfied with the high shine on my tires !!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff but beware!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works real well! Just a note of caution, don't breathe it in. Wear a mask when applying because it will mess you up! I got a severe headache, difficulty breathing, and I was wearing a mask !
customer_reviews.author: Rob C. Southampton

customer_reviews.title: it works well but the overspray makes the garage floor ...
customer_reviews.text: it works well but the overspray makes the garage floor slippery and it made brake dust stick to the rim so i had to scrub it off. It works well...just keep it on the tires only
customer_reviews.author: Tom Flint

customer_reviews.title: Great tire shine
customer_reviews.text: I love this tire shine, I use it every time I clean the cars. Spray it on, let it set and wipe off the excess. I do not use this as a spray and go or else it will leave a greasy film down the side of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong with Meguiar's
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I always use Meguiar's to shine my tires which leaves a better shine than what you get when you take your car to be washed. My tires stay shinning for days. Cons: Strong odor when shinning your tires, but my tires look fresh. Other Thoughts: I saved about $2 - $3 buying it online which saved me a trip to Autozone.
customer_reviews.author: RobertG714

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tire shine! Lasts for a couple of days. Have used for years and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Find the cheapest price on this shine and just buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tire shine I've tried. I've tried a lot. And it smells good
customer_reviews.author: BassMasterBass

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm... no.
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly not as bright as a shine as Meguiar's other product ENDURANCE TIRE DRESSING AEROSOL. Also, The Endurance spray lasts longer and smells way better.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, wears away quickly though
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, makes our car tires look shiny and wet. 4-stars only, since this shine doesn't last very long (only a few days after applying, the shine is gone)
customer_reviews.author: J. Hazeltine

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tire shine
customer_reviews.text: This has been my all time favorite tire shine - and way cheaper on Amazon than local auto zone type store. Love how it goes on like you are spray painting your tires, not some foam that gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best tire shine around
customer_reviews.text: Best tire shine around! I just spray it on and do t wipe it down and my tires look great!!
customer_reviews.author: Linus

customer_reviews.title: It does shiny tire things
customer_reviews.text: I like to find all sorts of rubbery things to spray it on. It keep rubber things shiny. If you like shiny rubber this is the stuff to buy.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my preferred tire gloss. It's last a good while and it smells pretty good, too. Easy to apply. Quick to dry.
customer_reviews.author: H. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff...
customer_reviews.text: This product may be a bit to bright for some but it applies easily and lasts for a very long time. Good stuff...
customer_reviews.author: B. Lynn Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: Super shine
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and goes on quick. It doesn't stay on as long as the product car wash companies use. I keep it in my truck and spray when needed. It makes my truck look cleaner when I didn't even wash it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellsbells

customer_reviews.title: Best tire shine I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best tire shine I have ever used. Easy application, long lasting, and gives a great shine to my tire. Certainly better than I expected, would definitely buy some more when I ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Sutanto

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully you get your order
customer_reviews.text: Wow never showed up .wasted my time and money would never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great long lasting shine, and application could not be easier.
customer_reviews.author: ESK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product as an artificial sweet smell that lingers for days on your tires but the shine lasts longer than any product I have ever used. Makes the white paint really stand out!!
customer_reviews.author: Gymnast_Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Best for any tire!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my tires glossy. It last like 2 weeks. I'll buy more of this definitely.
customer_reviews.author: GIULLIANO

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not for more then 6 bucks. Doesn't last to long and has STRONG chemical odor when Bing sprayed
customer_reviews.text: Does okay, doesn't keep it black for very long. The spray does not cover much area and I spray twice as much as the Black Magic spray I have been using. For years. The price is nuts ... Target sells this for like $6.50 BTW. But the price does come down here to like $6 from time to time as well. DO NOT pay like $13 for this. I do not like the harsh smell of this spray as well, very strong and hard to spray a large 33" off road tire like mine and get complete coverage without not breathing cause it's so strong I will be going back to the black magic
customer_reviews.author: Chris I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff, It makes your tires shine. One can for me does not last really long, but I think it tops off your car after each wash.
customer_reviews.author: tcandles41

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Spray I snot working, return was not allowed by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Castro

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ties looking like new.
customer_reviews.text: Love this but wish it left just a bit of a gloss look, but that's just my opinion. Still a great product to keep dull rubber tires looking great
customer_reviews.author: jeodee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great results and very easy to use. Ill have to do is while down any excess on the rims.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Meguiars last a long time and keeps the tires looking great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Armor All in the past - it washes off in slight rain. Meguiars last a long time and keeps the tires looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Coach c

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT. AND ALSO AT A GOOD PRIZE
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD PRODUCT .AND ALSO AT A GOOD PRIZE.THANKS AMASON
customer_reviews.author: CAMERON

customer_reviews.title: Great product, try it you will like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy, fast to apply and gives a great wet look, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Valhalla17

product_meta.title: MEGUIAR'S G-13815 Hot Shine High Gloss Tire Coating - 15 oz.
product_meta.description: Meguiar's Hot Shine High Gloss formula gives your tires a wet-look with a dark shine. By combining highly water-resistant polymers with anti-ozonant technology, Hot Shine keeps your tires looking black longer while preventing cracking, browning and premature aging.
feature_bullets: Delivers long-lasting, intense shine without annoying overspray, drips and mess
Combines water resistant polymers, enhanced resin technology, premium silicones, and antiozonants to protect and keep tires black and shiny longer
Convenient and easy to use Aerosol that allows you to simply spray and walk away
Applies smoothly for a consistently deep, black, wet looking shine that lasts for weeks
Exclusive formula levels evenly and quickly to prevent streaking, then bonds to the tire to create a long-lasting shine

specifications.Model: Meguiar's G13815 Hot Shine High Gloss Tire Coating - 15 oz.
specifications.Cover Included: Meguiar's G13815 Hot Shine High Gloss Tire Coating - 15 oz.
